name: Minute Escape
description:
You're trapped in a cave that will collapse in only one minute.  You'll need to figure out where to go and what and do, and quick.

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2019.  The theme is ONLY ONE.  In this game, the ONLY ONE is one minute.  Metroidvanias are ordinarily sprawling adventure games with nonlinear design, so I sought a way to give that same experience with a new limitation.
